headline: Meridian Growth Fund Trimmed The Cooper Companies (COO) For Valuation Discipline
summary: Meridian Funds, managed by ArrowMark Partners, released its “Meridian Growth Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. On September 18th, the U.S. Federal Reserve (“Fed”) reduced interest rates by 0.5%, bringing much-needed relief to investors. This crucial action contributed to stabilizing the markets following a volatile August. […]
